```py
>>> x = np.ma.array(np.arange(9).reshape(3, 3), mask=[[1, 0, 0],
...                                                   [1, 0, 0],
...                                                   [0, 0, 0]])
>>> x
masked_array(
 data=[[--, 1, 2],
 [--, 4, 5],
 [6, 7, 8]],
 mask=[[ True, False, False],
 [ True, False, False],
 [False, False, False]],
 fill_value=999999) 
```

```py
>>> np.ma.compress_rowcols(x)
array([[7, 8]])
>>> np.ma.compress_rowcols(x, 0)
array([[6, 7, 8]])
>>> np.ma.compress_rowcols(x, 1)
array([[1, 2],
 [4, 5],
 [7, 8]]) 
```
